summary: A dramatic and penetrating examination of the intellectual and moral standards existing at Oxford University, England, in the early 1970s.
cast: Jane Birkin|Alessio Orano|John Steiner|Rossella Falk|Micaela Pignatelli|Edda Di Benedetto|Iain Sinclair|Bianca Maria Corbella|Carlo Spadoni|John Gayford|Susan Jones|Ben Etoria
title: Alba pagana
